relation: Great for these types of students
Anything outdoors. Sports. Lots of Running club.
Ask a lot of questions about tuition and housing
Alaska Pacific University has friendly staff. They are a very small campus so it's more close knit. They are very expensive

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews William from Anchorage, AK 06/01/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 20 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Open minded, willing to learn things outside courses and take initiative in discussions and who learn better by doing and talking about the topic at hand. Tips for prospective students Be open and expressive Bang for the buck Fairly high tuition but very much worth it, professors will answer any questions you have and advisors, teachers, staff, other students always have an open ear. Am enjoying being here Great welcoming atmosphere, friendly people. Professors always welcome questions even if they're not precisely on topic they will do their best to answer and if they cannot figure out an answer (i.e philosophical type question) students are asked and it becomes a discussion usually
